data.prayer: Father, help the 1,635,790 believers in Laguna to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 10,107,310 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Laguna, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Laguna, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Laguna, Philippines to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 10,107,310 lost in Laguna that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Iranun people.
Father, guide the church in Laguna, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Laguna unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary:
the state of Laguna, Philippines has a population of 11,743,100.

We estimate Laguna has 1,635,790 people who might know Jesus, 9,046,356 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,060,954 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 1,635,790 believers in Laguna and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
